plot: The Ice King announces that he is engaged and to the shock of Finn and Jake it seems the bride is actually willing. But will the Ice King give up his princess kidnapping ways?

In "When Wedding Bells Thaw", The Ice King announces that he is engaged and to the shock of Finn and Jake it seems the bride is actually willing. In "Freak City", Finn is transformed into a foot by a magic man, and joins forces with a band of misfits to turn back to normal.—unknown
